name: Hawaiian Macaroni Salad
author: Jessica Daulton
summary: Simple and tasty macaroni salad just like you'd get at a Hawaiian restaurant. No fruit in this salad, just macaroni, carrot, and dressing. Very yummy and easy to make.
ingredients: 2 cups mayonnaise, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Combine the macaroni, mayonnaise, milk, and carrot in a large bowl; mix until macaroni is well coated
Add more mayonnaise for a wetter consistency
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, or up to overnight
